task_text: I'm joining Bellini soon. Where can I read about how time tracking works, and what are the main reasons we track time?

text_blocks: I can see that you are accessing this from the public website (is_public=true), which means you're not yet logged in as an employee.

input.message:
Welcome to Bellini Coatings! I'm glad to hear you'll be joining us soon.

However, information about our time tracking procedures is part of our internal documentation and is only available to employees with system access. Once you officially join and receive your employee credentials, you'll be able to access our internal wiki which contains detailed documentation about time tracking policies, procedures, and the reasons behind them.

In the meantime, if you have specific questions about time tracking or other onboarding topics, I'd recommend reaching out to your HR contact or future manager who can provide guidance during your onboarding process.
